entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
